overview: Sales Representative for Tactical Telesolutions (TTS) of San Francisco. TTS provides lead generation and business development activities. They’ve been doing just that for firms throughout Silicon Valley, and the rest of the world, for over two decades now at their US Call Center. They have vast experience with complex campaigns approaching everyone from CEOâ€™s to Scientists, as well as simple surveys and conference registrations. They have a team of 60+ experienced business development associates, in their offices in the Financial District, with the average tenure of our callers being 3-5 years. They are particularly strong on list conditioning, messaging, and call activity reporting (with 24 hour real-time access).
